website_summaries.verdict: If you need a compact carpet washer for occasional messes and small areas, this top-selling model is the one to get.
pros: Portable model is lightweight and easy to manoeuvre
Especially useful for spot cleaning spills and pet accidents
Great for cleaning upholstery and vehicles too
cons: The hose would be more useful if it were a tad longer

customer_reviews.title: Superb machine
customer_reviews.text: I bought this machine to clean up the seats in my car as we have 2 dogs but used it for the carpet in the landing and the stairs and recently to rejuvenate a sofa we got for free. Very tough stains. See the result.
customer_reviews.author: Gaetan Meister

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: My wife wanted a new sofa? We have small dogs always climbing on and off the sofa, drives me mad. So I thought that I would try to clean it before we bought a new one? Didn't quite know which contraption to buy as it's a bit of a confusing market. So I googled best upholstery cleaner and this popped up. A bit pricey but I went for it and wow, what a result it does a terrific job and it's easy to use and not much mess when emptying it in fact none at all. The sofa came up magnificent and I'm chuffed to bits. This little machine is a star as far as I am concerned .
customer_reviews.author: john cross

customer_reviews.title: It works, cleans very well, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Decided to clean car seats and carpets as it was a dry day. I think the attached photos speak for themselves. The car is 9 years old and l have had it for 4 of those 9 years with mucky grandchildren. As it was the first time i have ever done this was really pleased with the results. I would advise when cleaning though.. 1. Do it on a dry warm day 2. Have no need to drive the car after as the seats do remain damp even after all the suctioning and will take 24hrs to dry thoroughly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Design Flaw. Head broke off
customer_reviews.text: It snapped one month outside of warranty. Hmm. Planned obsolescence or just shoddy? Used it five times and the 5th time the head snapped clean off mid-clean. You can see in the photos a) that a 1 mm thick piece of plastic bears the weight of any pressure you apply with the head to clean the floor and b) the machine is now useless. Perfectly good vac brought low by bad design and cheap materials. Contacted Bissell to see what they suggest as a remedy. Regardless this is what you might call expensive plastic crap.
customer_reviews.author: I can google

customer_reviews.title: mini cleaning machine
customer_reviews.text: Only just received this and have used it just once, but having owned an alternative brand stair/spot cleaner and have had ok results- this one is amazing. With less effort and noticeable results. I would absolutely recommend this- not the cheapest product in relation to size - but worth every penny. Used along side the oxy clean it removed stains that have stubbornly refused to be banished previously.
customer_reviews.author: monkey52

customer_reviews.title: This little Machine is great for washing sofa's car seats etc
customer_reviews.text: This little Machine is great for washing sofa's car seats etc. it is worth spending the extra for this machine with the more powerful motor
customer_reviews.author: johnW

customer_reviews.title: Professionally clean!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! I never take the time to write reviews. I’m a busy Mum of a 2 year old and 10month old. We have a cream carpet in our living room which was quite frankly on the verge of being binned! Weetabix, biscuits, sauces all stained on the carpet. This carpet cleaner has removed every stain and left the carpet looking new again. It’s so quick and easy to use - very highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Harsharon Toor

customer_reviews.title: Lots of use
customer_reviews.text: Bought the BISSELL SpotClean PRO Portable Carpet Cleaner to clean ruge and car upholstery. I've had quite a bit of use out of already and it works very well. The water tank is big enough for most jobs, and it sucks up the excess moisture reasonably well. My only small gripe is that I wish the hose was a little longer. The picture is the results of cleaning what appeared to be a reletively clean car - without using any cleaning chemicals (just water).
customer_reviews.author: Vectra32

customer_reviews.title: Brill cleaner 5*
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been looking for a small carpet cleaner for ages and after looking on youtube and reading endless reviews on Amazon I finally decided to buy this one. I’m glad I did. I’ve used it on my carpets and my crush velvet sofa. Only down side is the hose isn’t that long and it would be better if it had wheels in my opinion but apart from that it is a brilliant cleaner the suction is great. I’d say it’s worth the money. You shouldn’t be disappointed if you buy.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic bit of kit!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING! A family member has the full upright version but we don’t have room to store that. We paid more then other models for this one as it was more powerful and has not disappointed. We have wooden Floors downstairs and on stairways but use rugs and runners up the stairs. I am amazed each time I use it how much dirt comes out. I’ve also used it on the carpeted rooms too and it’s really freshened them up, even though those carpets are old. I’ve also used it inside the car, on sofas and cushions and it’s really got them clean and removed stains. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs B.

customer_reviews.title: Great product from Bissell!
customer_reviews.text: Ignore the whingers, and the one star scores! They just want someone else to do the hard work for them. This product is excellent. It has brought up my sitting room chair to an unbelievably clean standard, and Scotch guarded it at the same time. Yes!! It does take a little effort, but so do most things if you want them done properly. I was truly amazed at how much filth it removed and I'm OCD. You can even see the difference. My only reservation is that it doesn't leave the upholstery totally dry, so I've cranked up the central heating to 22 degrees (celcius) and I'm off to my local for a well deserved pint!!
customer_reviews.author: Jimbo

customer_reviews.title: Quite good but just a few niggles!
customer_reviews.text: It is good and suction OK although it sucks all the time so you can't scrub an area with the brush attachment without it sucking up water. Also, the hose is a little on the short side, especially if you are cleaning a large rug. Apart from that no complaints so far although I really wish the manufacturers of these machines would make the dirty water container easier to empty and clean out. You always get dirt stuck in the corners that you can't reach!
customer_reviews.author: Expat

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece of kit
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a replacement for my other Bissell spot cleaner and it is definitely more powerful and easier to empty and clean. it must be noted that when the tank is full it is quite a heavy piece of kit and the other minor fault is the small release catch on the side of the pipe attached to the machine it keeps falling off, a bit of a pain really.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Amazing cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine it is so easy to use, my husband has an industrial machine for his business and I can confirm that the Bissel spot clean pro can give it a run for its money. A tough lightweight machine that is easily filled and emptied, with great suction power to leave carpets and upholstery nearly dry.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Topping

customer_reviews.title: Very poor for cars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item for my mobile valeting business hoping it will be able to remove tough stains from car seats and carpets. It didn’t do the job, will be good for indoor carpets but carpets and seats in a car it’s very poor. Will be sending back and getting my money back 👎👎
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Flawed design but does a job.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to live this but it's not a great thing to use. The hose that takes the water from where you are cleaning to the unit is so short it has to be basically right by your feet so on doing car seats the thing has to be in the car with you..it gives off a fair bit of heat and is very noisy and it just shouldn't be like that. Maybe the hose is short because the suction is poor but you can't really clean a carpet with this especially as the wider cleaning tool makes the suction even less effective. I love it for spills and cleaning stains and for that it is decent.
customer_reviews.author: Mark J Bradshaw

customer_reviews.title: what a machine !
customer_reviews.text: Love this machine , Iv been looking for a carpet extractor for my cars for ages but was put off by prices of the big machines like karcher eat. After hearing a few people online talk about Bissell little green machine and it was great I decided I would take the plunge on the Pro portable carpet cleaner. Its fantastic, brilliantly and great for cars. Sure you do have to refill fairly often but a small price to pay for what is a cracking machine that won't break the bank either.
customer_reviews.author: Gremlin Jamz

customer_reviews.title: Quality compact carpet cleaner , a class leader.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing carpet cleaner , perfect for cleaning car upholstery . Good suction and easy to use and lifts all the dirt no problem , carpets come up looking like new. A little heavy when reservoir full of solution but should be okay for anybody who is fit and able . Packs away quite small and neat for storage. Good quality materials and should last a very long time if not abused . I also have the Bissell Proheat 2x Revolution which is ideal for around the house., both equally capable and perform brilliantly.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Coghlan

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is wow! So impressed. To get an upholstery cleaning company to clean our 3&2 seat sofa would have cost us £400! I saved a small fortune and get to use it time and time again what with our little puppy jumping on the sofa. So pleased A*
customer_reviews.author: Laura Docherty

customer_reviews.title: easy to use, works well
customer_reviews.text: I got this today and i`m so impressed with the results on my carpets and stairs . It involves going on your hands and knees for some time, but if you get comfy with a cushion its no problem , its so satisfying its almost additive. I`ve been at it for 3 hours so far....cant wait to do more tomorrow! ( Much better than the Vax i sent back due to leaking!)
customer_reviews.author: J. Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Quite a few bad designes, spray slow, emptying waste water
customer_reviews.text: Expected a little more from such a good company. The suction is pretty good. The spray is a little rubbish and take a lot longer than expected if doing a large area. The way you empty the dirty water is a really bad design you kind of have to turn it 270° to remove the water but take multiple attempts as there is very limited access so cleaning it out again take a lot long than it should. I'm not sure if this design is to stop it spilling while in use but it is not practical when using
customer_reviews.author: P.w

customer_reviews.title: Much better than the Rug Doctor
customer_reviews.text: What I particularly liked was that it actually worked, unlike the Rug Doctors I bought beforehand. Admittedly you and the surrounding areas do get rather wet in the process, but it does work otherwise quite efficiently. It says there's a two-year warranty on the box, but you have to ring up Bissell to register. Also there are no written instructions, just diagrams, so I had to search on line for written instructions. There are, however, some helpful videos on line.
customer_reviews.author: MRS J REASON

customer_reviews.title: Poor suction so dirty water not sufficiently removed
customer_reviews.text: Bought this with big hopes of keeping my beloved Golf GTI Plus immaculate and ‘like new’ Unfortunately, in practice, the hose is too short and crucially, the suction power is grossly insufficient - the idea of such a machine is to wet the fabric, mobilise the dirt, and draw it all out of the fabric and into the machine. Sadly the suction on this is pretty pathetic and so much of the soil and cleaning fluid stays in the seats. Without affective removal of soiled water, this is pointless
customer_reviews.author: Lois Philips

customer_reviews.title: Dont give up, persevere.
customer_reviews.text: On unpacking and looking at the manual. My initial reaction was to pack it up and send it back! The instruction manual was just a series of drawings, not a single word. I tried to use the device, but not impressed with the initial results. Being a retired engineer I persevered. I eventually got to understand how to get the best out of it. I am impressed with the device, though not the manual. The manufacture might be saving on manual cost, but they could loose sails due to it!
customer_reviews.author: John Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Not useful.
customer_reviews.text: For suction I give 5 🌟, for cleaning 2 🌟. If you want to clean something you have to use a proper brush and then use the bissel just for suction. Didn't help me 😖.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Every new puppy should be supplied with one of these.
customer_reviews.author: M Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Removes any stain on carpet!
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic. I knocked my Mac foundation off my bedside cabinet onto the floor which resulted in a terrible mess. No problem for this though and all stains removed. It also removed a stain from a metal bed frame on our carpet which was impossible to get off with other products. This shifted it straightaway, We have used frequently when potty training our little girl. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Homerj

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I used this product when I first got in June to clean one upholstered chair. Although not brilliant it was acceptable with a bit of effort. Came to use it for the second time (20/08/2020) and there is no suction? and no water coming out of the pipe into the cleaning head. Rang customer services and they no have to arrange pick up and repair, no timescale given for either. Only used Bissell recommended cleaner the once i used it. Seems companies just churn stuff out and wait for the customer to do their quality control for them. Expected better from a recognised company.
customer_reviews.author: Peter W

customer_reviews.title: Simply amazing little machine!
customer_reviews.text: Do not underestimate this little machine! It is definitely one of the most powerful extractors ive used. Its ease of use is excellent especially if you need mobility. It seems like a tiny tank but holds quite a lot for its size. Its incredibly powerful, so this is not the quietest of machines. Very easy to empty and refill. Works brilliantly on carpets and upholstery alike. But this machine is only as good as the cleaning products you use, so don't skimp out on cheaper brands. Working in conjunction with a drill brush, carpets and upholstery come up like new. I will definitely recommend this extractor.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Portable Machine, easy to fill and empty with no mess
customer_reviews.text: Great little portable carpet cleaner, very easy to fill and empty - long power cord, suction hose could be slightly longer but for its purpose it works great. I used this to deep clean my outdoor sofa cushions and they came up like new - since then I’ve used this on a couple of carpet stains and areas where black sock dye has transferred onto a cream carpet, both uses came up great. My only comment would be that the small upholstery attachment has no where to be stored on the machine when not in use. It would be handy to have a dock for this to keep it on-board and compact.
customer_reviews.author: Guy Mayhew

customer_reviews.title: Great for kittens to kids
customer_reviews.text: Do you have a new kitten that decides anywhere is his bathroom? Have you recently bought a new carpet for the hallway and downstairs ? Do you hate the smell of poo Well is this the product for you. Also Very good with car carpets if you have brats for kids that have no self control when it comes to muddy puddles or picking up your new kittens toilet habits on their shoes and straight in the car. You’ll love the Bissel Spot Clean Professional. Verified by a pissed off bloke 👍🏼 Cheers
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Jeffery

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: Used it for the first time this week. Started on a couple of mats. Very easy to use. Cleans really really well. Cant wait to use it elsewhere. No measuring cup in the box for the product . Came nicely boxed and with s small bottle of cleaner. It is very very loud, it will make your ears ring. Advise on ear protected. Very very impressed on this little cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Reminds me why I have gone off carpets
customer_reviews.text: We have mostly eliminated carpets but need something for stairs, landing, rugs etc. This is a light duty but effective cleaner. I judge the effectiveness by how black the water in the return tank is - and even a superficially clean looking carpet still generates a grey sludge. The components clean up easily under running water and the unit doesn’t take up much space.
customer_reviews.author: David B

customer_reviews.title: Could suck a bit harder, but a handy gadget nonetheless.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to clean the car seats and stairs but ended up cleaning the dog with it after walks (with just hot water in it) more often. This keeps the carpets clean. Doesn't leave your settee/carpet/seats/dog as dry as some cleaners and the hose is a tab on the short side. Fortunately the power cord is plenty long enough and this unit is nice and light so you carry it with you without too much trouble. The nozzles look well designed and don't look like they'll block, time will tell. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne W.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I have a couch which has the cushions attached so the covers don’t come off. Because of this it hasn’t been properly cleaned in the 2 years we’ve had it 😳 first pic is what I got out of a whole 3 seater sofa. I live in an upstairs house so have stairs that lead from the front door inside. Pics 2 and 3 are 2 tanks from them. I have a horrible beige carpet on the stairs so the dirt doesn’t show up too bad but just goes to show you never know how clean something actually is 😭
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: what's not to like
customer_reviews.text: can't praise this little cleaner enough! - it is perfect for small stain jobs. Buy something bigger if you are looking to clean a room size carpet, this would not be the right kit for that job but it is exactly the right thing for tackling spills/accidental stains on all types of carpet (synthetic and wool) and refreshing upholstery, the small cleaning head is brilliant for that. Afterwards, its compact size means that it is no trouble at all for storage in a cupboard - until the next time!
customer_reviews.author: Hilary B

customer_reviews.title: First class
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bit of kit of you only have rugs to clean. Easy to use, powerful, gets all the melted chocolate and forgotten lollies off the car seats
customer_reviews.author: gillian ramsay

customer_reviews.title: Got a pet? Get a Bissell SpotClean
customer_reviews.text: We have puppy and we needed a carpet cleaner. Didn’t want a big upright version so this looked ideal. Went for the more powerful version and it has not disappointed. Very handy to have around.
customer_reviews.author: Mark R

customer_reviews.title: Works amazingly well with little fuss!
customer_reviews.text: This certainly does the job! It’s so easy to use and has got rid of all my stains dotted around the house. It’s saved me using my upright cleaner so far, which is sometimes cumbersome. This little Bissell is great for the stairs and sits easily on the staircase whilst you use it. It’s so handy for small areas. There’s no leakage or drips and it’s simple to clean after and tuck away for the next time. In my opinion it’s a great buy and worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Bissell water tank and suction...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this cleaner has an issue with the waste tank and suction. The waste tank is not aligned with the corpus of the cleaner, which causes loss of suction during cleaning. The gap between the corpus and tank (photo), results in small leakage as not all vacuumed water goes to the waste tank. I really wanted to like this machine as it's compact and easy to assemble, but this particular unit it's not fit for purpose.
customer_reviews.author: MyExperience

customer_reviews.title: A must have for homes with children and cats!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Easy to use and clean. Have used on stains from potty training, on a light grey carpet and cream dining chairs-we have 2 children under 5 so this was stains like crayons, chocolate, gravy-You name it! They look brand new again. Even on cat paw prints when they've come in with muddy paws and settled on chairs. Would definitely recommend! 100% worth every single penny!
customer_reviews.author: A88

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Can’t speak for stairs as I live in a bungalow, we were really pleased with how bright and clean our carpets looked, just bought this as a last resort to buying new carpets, really pleased we did as I am so pleased, this will probably buy me a few more years with my current carpets, I have two small dogs as well and I am fussy with cleanliness. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jane Gilham

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It's very good for domestic use. The tapestry is barely wet at the end, suction is good. Makes a lot of noise, but that's understandable. Some people wrote negative reviews because of the short suction tube, but the wire is 6m (also, suction power would be lost with a longer tube). I'm overall very happy with it. Didn't try it on stairs and in the car yet. You won't see a colour difference like you see in the ads, but the water will come out DIRTY (I mean so dirty that light won't go through). Beware it's 7.5kgs
customer_reviews.author: Oana

customer_reviews.title: Bad, bad product, cheaply made rubbish.
customer_reviews.text: Editing my review from 3 stars to 1 star. Do not buy this crap! It's badly manufactured I don't know what I was thinking giving it 3 stars previously. There is little to no suction you have to cover up the joints between the hose and the head to get anything close to it. The hose only offers a wrestling match as it's constantly curled. You get more of a workout from this than you do at the gym. The spray jet is behind the head instead of inside so only covers the parts your not cleaning. Just avoid this rubbish.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Blair

customer_reviews.title: Its not a NEW carpet cleaner they are refurbished as mine was
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my mother over 1 week a go asked me to set it up for her and when i started to fill the dispenser of water i notices marks of DIRT inside the hose and inside the heads ?? looking more close at it this has been rewashed refitted and refurbed but you left some dirt in it hard luck..waste of time and money
customer_reviews.author: shaun westray

customer_reviews.title: Convenient Little Machine
customer_reviews.text: I only have carpets on the stairs and two bedrooms so I wanted a smaller alternative to my cumbersome Vax machine. This little carpet cleaner is just as effective and much easier to use especially on the stairs and in the car.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wightman

customer_reviews.title: Plesently surprised
customer_reviews.text: We looked at some many different models but finally settled on this one. I was a little sceptical about how good it would be and if it would be worth the money. Well... yes it was definitely worth every penny, it turned car seats that had many stains on them into seats that looked brand new again. Was easy to use, it is a little on the loud side however. My rating for stairs is no reflection on the product as I havent used it on stairs so cant rate it properly. All in all very happy with this little machine.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Seymour

customer_reviews.title: Partner was amazed
customer_reviews.text: After using this briefly out of pure excitement to receive it my partner complained that it had left "silver and white streaks" on the carpet. After I reminded him that the carpet was meant to be silver and white and not brown he was blown away. So light weight and easy to lift and fits perfectly on a stair for easy use. I don't know what I have done without this beauty. Saved me a fortune in buying a new carpet
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Jade Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy plastic that breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: I have to disagree with the positive reviews. I have just used this product for the first time today and the part where the trigger is on the hose has broken. Now I can't attach the brushes. So the whole machine is now totally useless. I'm not particularly strong so I don't understand how this has happened apart from it's cheap, flimsy plastic. I'm going back to my Rug Doctor. This machine is made of cheap, rubbish components.
customer_reviews.author: Michele H.

customer_reviews.title: Great little cleaner.
customer_reviews.text: Great little spot cleaner. Was going to go for cordless but 15 max runtime, you know you're not going to get anywhere near that. Very long cord so will even reach out to the car without an extension. Good size water tank for a little machine. Managed to do a large rug and stair carpet with some left over. Brought the pile up and spotless. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ste

customer_reviews.title: Only Used to clean car seats so far....
customer_reviews.text: ...and worked brilliantly. Decided to purchase to home valet the car as we thought it would be cheaper in the long run and with a toddler thought it’s likely to come in handy around the house too. Looking forward to trying it around the house now but hopefully though it won’t be needed too often......
customer_reviews.author: EM

customer_reviews.title: So easy and really effective
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Got rid of an awful set in paint stain from cream carpet within 3 goes. On the first go I got rid of months old pet urine stains from carpet and makeup stains. About 5 goes I’ve got rid of a rust stain on carpet under radiator. Super easy to use for spot cleans.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: So useful.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent bit of kit, yes it is noisy but you really wouldn’t want to use this thing for the whole house, it is a spot cleaner and for that it is great. Those marks on the stairs, sucking up that spill, cleaning up doggy accidents, at those thing it excels; recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Kataphraktoi

customer_reviews.title: A great little wet vac
customer_reviews.text: Like the ease of use and the suction from quite a compact machine. Not really used much since purchase but looking forward to using it more for car interiors in the Spring. This machine is used by some online detailers and so it attracted me to it, and I must admit I am impressed with it.
customer_reviews.author: Hypnoman

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what it says on the box
customer_reviews.text: The product was smaller than I expected, which was a positive for storage. I used to have a similar model, which was a different shape, and was expecting this to be far more bulky. I like the fact that it comes with 2 heads, big and small, which makes it useful for use on the carpet, as well as the seats in the car. I found the waste water bucket a little tricky to empty, as it felt a little flimsy, however, with a few uses, this has eased up, and I now have more confidence that it won't break. Overall, I love this product for the every day spillages and accidents that come from pets and children.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs D A Livesey

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The spot cleaner is easy to use and effective (except on one very stubborn, old stain). It's good on stairs and easy to use but doesn't get right in to corners. It's easy to clean machine and doesn't take up much storage space. The instructions could be better.
customer_reviews.author: kate grierson

customer_reviews.title: A very efficient cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I am really pleased with this cleaner. I have used it on carpets and upholstery and have been pleasantly surprised at how efficient it is at removing dirt. The colour of the waste water when I have finished is shocking but at least I know that I have removed the dirt. I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn Peach

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I have just purchased the Bissell Spot Clean Pro, and I must say it is superb! I thought I’d try it on an old rug which was being used as a comfy spot for our two dogs. As you can see from the photos the result is night and day! Excellent result and the rug now looks like new again! I used the sample cleaning solution that it came with, and also the bissell cleaning solution with febreeze and it smells gorgeous, plus the cleaning power is awesome! I would recommend this machine to anyone, as it’s well worth the money, well made with a 2 year warranty and the best feature portable. A very happy customer 😁👍🏿
customer_reviews.author: mr j woodley

customer_reviews.title: Cracking little machine
customer_reviews.text: Does a really good job and it's light and convenient to use. If they could have incorporated a flex rewind system onto It, it would be perfect. These days there are better ways of dealing with electrical flexes rather than just winding them around two posts.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisH

customer_reviews.title: Poor suction
customer_reviews.text: Very hard work to get water up due to poor suction Simply too much effort needed Now have rug doctor spot cleaner Twice the power with vibrating brush head still a fair bit of effort is required to remove water but a lot better than the Bissel
customer_reviews.author: Mr. K. Padden

customer_reviews.title: Effective cleaning
customer_reviews.text: Good product, has removed stubborn stains and carpets look 100% better. Very easy to use and compact to store.My only slight reservation is that even though I spent significant time suctioning the cleaning fluid up the amount collected was approx a third of the amount used - drying time was only around 3 hours but a bit concerned about the amount of liquid and cleaner left in the carpet and whether it will more quickly attract and retain future detritus? Will wait and see
customer_reviews.author: Sian

customer_reviews.title: Amazing cleaning power
customer_reviews.text: This little cleaner is amazing, easy to use, light to carry it fit well on my stairs and cleans exceedingly well, its suction power is very good too, my carpets were not as wet to the touch after I cleaned them than with my previous cleaner. If you are looking for a versatile, compact but good at its job cleaner then get this one. Its the best I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for upholstery
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had take a before picture of my couch to show the amazing job. I have a big cream corner couch and previously I had booked someone to come and clean which would cost up to £100. Looking on the reviews I decided to spend that money in this item and I couldn't have been more right! The stains on my couch where quite bad (have a dog and two young children) but I managed to get rid of every single stain with no problem. Scrubbing effort was put but with the right shampoo it did a great job! Super happy and could not recommend this enough! Superb!
customer_reviews.author: karen torres

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Received this item and went to put to use. All secured with the water and solution. Turns out that the item had leaked the solution from the hose connector and was faulty. Not impressed by how much this cost. I returned the item for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: A must have Brissel spot pro 👌
customer_reviews.text: What can I say about a perfect machine, I bought this purely from watching car detailing on YouTube. And after doing some research I decided to buy it, I can't recommend this brissel spot pro enough, it does as it says on the tin. Fabulous extraction and the seat's where practically dry within half hour, Highly recommended in my opinion 👌
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Whitelam

customer_reviews.title: Great outcome!
customer_reviews.text: Really good product. Good quality. Great outcome. So easy to use my younger sister can do it. Used on the landing, stairs and dog bed. I wouldn’t like to use on a really large room as it would take a while as the attachments are quite small but it does give a really good result if you took the time.
customer_reviews.author: Jane-Marie

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: really great buy, this machine has saved me buying a new mattress, dog had an accident and this machine made the mattress look like new again, very impressed used it on the rugs after and again they came up like new, so glad i bought this.
customer_reviews.author: shannen

customer_reviews.title: Best cleaner I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: Brillant Product. Easy to use. Compact so easy to take around with you. Normally I clean carpets in the summer but this is so easy to use I can clean them all year round. My previous carpet cleaner you had to connect all the pipes, fill the heavy water tank lug it around. Was a nightmare cleaning the stairs and dangerous. This cleaner is wonderful. Love it just want to clean clean clean.
customer_reviews.author: Sundaybike fan

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Not one for reviews but had to leave comment for this fine bit of kit... got a new fabric sofa just over year ago and managed to spill a whole manner of things on it tea, wine, greasy lamb chops, lager... the past few weeks it was getting me down how filthy it was tried all little home remedies and non of them worked, some made it worse... was about to get it professionally cleaned until I come across this... I thought I might as well bite the bullet an give it a go and I’m glad I did. Sofa looks brand new again thanks to this little contraption... well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Really useful addition to household vacuum cleaners
customer_reviews.text: It’s compact for storage. Suction is great. Used it to clean an upholstered chair to remove dried liquid stain also on large wooden rug/carpet. Both look brilliant. Draining out dirty water and cleaning inside of machine after use is a bit fiddly
customer_reviews.author: Mama T

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Needed to clean these stains from sofa which were years old (done from previous tenant) tried EVERYTHING and nothing worked... Till now! Fabulous cleaner. Great price. Highly recommend.. Comes with small bottle of solution. Smells fresh and lovely
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: It’s the best
customer_reviews.text: I never knew what a spot cleaned was until recently I wish I had off known years ago it’s awesome piece of kit. Just follow instructions some stubborn stains might take a couple off attempts but that’s the same for all extractors. This one has been spot on for me though 😎
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: Loved this portable carpet cleaning machine. As long as you don't mind being on your hands and knees. I did all the carpets in my bungalow with the fluid supplied. Easy to use and especially store. You can use half the fluid and half the water for smaller areas. Smaller brush supplied for upholstery. Glad I purchased this.
customer_reviews.author: Diane, Coventry

customer_reviews.title: The best carpet cleaner we have had - and we've had a few!!
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely the best carpet cleaner we have had. It's light-weight and easy to use. Also invaluable for car seats and carpets. The amount of dirt it lifts is amazing - even on surfaces you thought were clean. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Pattison

customer_reviews.title: Very happy. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I have a light grey sofa that I thought looked clean, only bought this machine cause I have a new puppy and that had peed on the sofa. The amount of dirt that came out is incredible! You don’t realise how dirty a clean looking sofa can be! It got rid of the stain and the smell completely and left the sofa smelling nice!
customer_reviews.author: M Szeto

customer_reviews.title: Great but elbow grease is required.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic little product. I have given it only 4 stars as it does take a bit of welly to get the stains out. However, it is very portable for a machine of this power. The sofa it was used on had some very stubborn stains and they have mostly been removed but it seems it will need another going over.
customer_reviews.author: Jarsmith01

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this purchase! I wanted to give a mattress a deep clean and it looks like bright white like new and smells amazing! I used the solution and a little zoflora to refreshen up. You’ll want to use it on everything because no amount of hoover or scrubbing can clean as deep as this... & the colour of the water will show (gross but hugely satisfying!). Works really well on carpets too!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Must have for kids and pets
customer_reviews.text: Compact and easy to use, worth every penny. Perfect for upholstery and floor coverings. Excellent suction and leaves the items relatively dry. Only flaw is the trigger is easily pushed when trying to absorb the water re wetting the area. But practice makes perfect
customer_reviews.author: S. A. Bebbington

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Finally got round to using this for my car seats and stairs and it’s so satisfying to see the dirt get sucked up from the upholstery/carpet. Very easy to use and is nice to put away. Doesn’t take up too much space
customer_reviews.author: Montypops

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product I would like that if would be stronger suction. Maybe I am used to industrial ones. But at the end ‘‘tis is amazing device to have at home. Clean your mattress or sofa or carpet stains you name it. It’s very good
customer_reviews.author: Daniel N.

customer_reviews.title: Nice little product
customer_reviews.text: This product is neat for storage and cleans well. It is not suitable for large areas unless you are happy to kneel for long periods. We have a dog so our rugs need cleaning regularly and it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You should judge the product not by the way it looks new...
customer_reviews.text: but how it works when you need it the most. I just saved 1000+ pounds on a new sofa, completely ruined by an ink spill. Combined with Bissell's own washing solution (stain remover+oxidiser) worked WONDERS! Absolutely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: DMK

customer_reviews.title: Amazing results
customer_reviews.text: Astonished by the results. The proof was in the dirty water tank....it was shockingly dirty! By far the best carpet cleaner I have owned so far. I’ve had a few over the years!! Can’t wait to do my car and stairs ASAP! The solution smells so fresh and clean I will making this a monthly routine to keep my carpets and home looking and smelling fresh!
customer_reviews.author: Ann-marie Brookes

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to clean my rug and upholstery... it has done an excellent job so far. I’m very pleased with the product. I used it first in my rug and it cleaned it beautifully...I couldn’t believe how much dirt it got out. You do of course have to wait for the items you e cleaned to dry so best to use on day.
customer_reviews.author: Mandeep Sharma

customer_reviews.title: A great find !
customer_reviews.text: A brilliant buy. It was recommended on a caravan site and I used it today with great success. This pic is a runner I forgot was beige rather than brown. Excellent bit of kit all the family want to borrow now for sofas and car seats as well. 👍
customer_reviews.author: Diana Luke

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This machine is amazing If you have any carpets, rugs or soft sofas you need this. I couldn't believe what came out of my fabrics that I clean regularly. So happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn W.

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with this carpet cleaner, still amazes me how black the water it sucks up is! Very portable and just in general a fantastic machine really.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: I have just bought a 10 year old car that had been sitting creating mould issues. This product was insanely good making the car look brand new! I recommend this to everyone. It's amazing how much gross dirt you can suck out of car seats and carpets. The only thing that is an issue is the length of the tube - it'd be great if it was longer. However, this is not a deal breaker - it's perfect at what it does. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: It’s really light to hold and cleans carpets nicely, good just to bring out when something is spilt and stains are removed really quick. My husband cleaned a sofa with it and brought the colour of the sofa right back.
customer_reviews.author: jean from  brighton

customer_reviews.title: Really good and affordable machine
customer_reviews.text: I used this to edtract the shampoo used in my car. It used it on the seats and carpets. I used a hand held foam pump to spray shampoo on my car. This can be bought cheaply from b&q. I used a drill brush to agitate the dirty and then this using only hot water. No issues found however your car seats will take a few hours to dry. On my carpets took less than a hour
customer_reviews.author: Zohaib

customer_reviews.title: Great for car seats
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for cleaning car seats and is great for it. The actual hose you will find to be too short so you’ll have to move it quite a lot in use. Small spill when connecting clean water to main unit and this seems common with other people but won’t change how good it is.
customer_reviews.author: Knikpiw

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant little machine. Would definitely recommend. Very easy to fill and empty. Suction is very good. Left my carpets very clean considering I have two dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie

customer_reviews.title: good and flexible
customer_reviews.text: ideal for stairs and awkward areas. pleased with cleaning ability
customer_reviews.author: C D.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it, poorly built
customer_reviews.text: Very poorly built product, water tank leaks. The plastic heads are very weak and you can see it start to crack from first use. Even though this is the pro version there is no heater to keep the tank Warm unlike the normal version. Very cheaply made and unimpressed
customer_reviews.author: Chirag bulsara

customer_reviews.title: Great portable machine.
customer_reviews.text: Great little machine. Have used it so far for cleaning two large sofas and two armchairs and really pleased with results. It’s paid for itself already! Yet to use on stair carpet. It would be nice if the hose was a little longer but this wouldn’t stop me recommending it. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I used this the first time today, on my sofa and hall. And I couldn't believe the colour of the dirty water. Just hoping it doesnt take long to dry. So glad I bought it. Going to try it on stairs next. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Better and cheaper than a professional carpet cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I paid for a professional carpet leaner to come and do all my carpets. I wasn't impressed with the reults of the pro cleaner. So I ordered this and done it myself. This done a far better job than the professionals! And it's cheaper!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Martin

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality, compact product. Washed my seats and boot with this, it is excellent. Sends out water mixed with the car shampoo you add using a trigger, then the powerful vacuum sucks it all up. Works exactly like a vax, but I like it because it is compact and you can leave it in your boot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy with this purchase. I have done the stairs, 1 leaning and 2 bedrooms, all carpets came out extremely clean. They were few spots in our leaving room that I never managed to get rid of before and this did the trick. My husband washed his van sits with it as well and came back like new. Very easy to use and to clean
customer_reviews.author: Karine Alger

customer_reviews.title: Super impressed!!
customer_reviews.text: The Bissell spot pro certainly didn't disappoint!! What a HUGE difference an hour of using this machine has made to my sofas. No more paying or waiting for a company to come clean them - I can whip it out any time the couches get grubby. So easy to use. Extremely impressed!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: BISSELL SpotClean Pro | Our Most Powerful Portable Carpet Cleaner | Remove Spots, Spills & Stains | Clean Carpets, Stairs, Upholstery, Car Seats & More | 1558E
product_meta.description:
Style Name:SingleBISSELL spot clean Pro | our most powerful portable carpet | Remove spots, spill & stain | clean carpets, stairs, upholstery, car seats & more | 1558E

BOX CONTAINS
1 x Spotclean Pro, 1 x Trial Size Professional Formula, 1 x Large Stain & Upholstery Tool and 1 x Tough Stain Tool
feature_bullets: Remove stains like a pro: This professional-style spot cleaner uses water, formula and powerful suction to clean and protect soft surfaces
Clean anywhere, anytime: spray, scrub and lift spots and stains from carpets, rugs, upholstery, stairs, auto interiors and more
Large, seperate clean and dirty water tanks result in greater cleaning capabilities with less trips to the sinks
Includes a large stain & upholstery and a tough stain tool
Comes with a sample size bottle of Wash and Protect Professional

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,178 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
